name: WP Best Analytics
author: Louis Fico

sections.description:
Best analytics plugin for having analytics installed on live sites and dev sites without showing up on both.

Major features in WP Best Analytics include:

  • Includes meta field option for verifying with Google Search Console and Bing Webmaster Tools
  • Define dev site URLs where you don’t want the analytics code to show.
sections.installation: Upload WP Best Analytics folder to your wp-content/plugins directory, then Activate it. Settings for the plugin will appear in the standard WordPress “Settings” menu.
sections.changelog:
2.0

Release Date – 19 December 2018
* Removed PHP warnings, Tested with the latest version of WordPress

1.1

Release Date – 13 September 2018
* Adds field for bing webmaster tools

1.0

Release Date – 08 August 2018
* Initial release
